title: 45 Park Lane wins ‘Best Employer Award’ at the Catey Awards
text:
45 Park Lane wins ‘Best Employer Award’ at the Catey Awards 45 Park Lane wins ‘Best Employer Award’ at the Catey Awards Details Category: Awards   11:45 45 Park Lane, Dorchester Collection’s contemporary Mayfair hotel, was recognised with the “Best Employer Award” at the 2015 Cateys on July 07, 2015. The Cateys, known for being the industry’s Oscar night, illuminates and celebrates the highest flyers, best teams and exceptional businesses that are shaping today’s hospitality industry. 
45 Park Lane’s win acknowledges the Dorchester Collection’s focus on developing its people. The hotel’s values are around passion, personality, respect, working together and innovation, which the teams are living on a daily basis. The leadership is committed to its people mission of “We Care” and this award demonstrates that the employees are fully engaged on this journey. Roland Fasel, Regional Director, UK and General Manager of The Dorchester said: ‘We are delighted to have been recognised for the dedication to our employees and our commitment to attract and retain the best people in the industry. The Dorchester, Coworth Park and 45 Park Lane are perpetually implementing creative initiatives to keep our teams passionate and focused’. Related articles
